title: Christmas Eve Live 2017
itunes:title: Christmas Eve Live 2017
description: Every Christmas Eve we follow the tradition of telling scary ghost stories around the fire. This is the audio from our live stream, unedited and lots of fun! So if you weren't able to join us at Facebook or YouTube for the live stream, you haven't missed it completely. We share listener's flash fiction and a story by Vonnie Winslow Crist, "The Return of Gunnar Kettilson." Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays everybody!!
